Welcome!

This is the personal website about me, Anthony Bruno. I am currently studying a bachelor of Computer Science at Flinders University. At the present moment of time I am looking for job experience (internships/part-time work) or a graduate position.


Skills

During my course, I have developed a wide range of skills. These include:

  • Programming (C++, Java)
  • Web Development (HTML, CSS, PHP, JavaScript)
  • Databases/Data Modelling (SQLite, XML, UML)
  • IDE's/Editors (Netbeans, Geany, vim, Atom)

Interests

I like doing online courses, including Free Code Camp and Hackerrank. I'm also a huge soccer fan and support Adelaide United (C'mon you reds!).
